entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 4:30 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: E 49 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late this evening. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 60 gusting to 80 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
